attributes.action: Refrain from closing beauty salons that comply with government regulations
attributes.additional_details: The implications of Locking down the Beauty Industry yet again, will cause a catastrophic wave of unemployment and salon closures for business  owners & those who are self employed. Despite abiding by health & safety regulations council inspections and new laws regarding PPE, we are being forced yet again to close our doors. I urge the government to look at the scientific evidence & track & trace statistics that the beauty industry is NOT contributing to the spread of the Virus.
attributes.background: Reconsider the decision to close the Beauty industry at the busiest time of year

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408
